lessons.lesson: Absolute Beginner Questions Answered by Candice
lessons.description: Candice answers your most commonly asked questions in an easy-to-understand format.

lessons.lesson: Can Do French for Absolute Beginners
lessons.description: Learn how to 'do' various tasks in French. A practical course.
In this pathway, you will learn how to give your contact information.
In this pathway, you will learn how to introduce yourself.
In this pathway, you will learn how to talk about your family.
Learn common words and phrases you'll need in conversations
Get a taste of real French conversation with these short animations.
5 lessons, 30 minutes. Your quick-start guide to the absolute basics of French.
Isabelle will teach you must-know French phrases, step-by-step.

lessons.lesson: Prototype Video Lessons for Absolute Beginners
lessons.description: Want to get access to never-before-seen, experimental language lessons?.
By focusing on the sounds which don't exist in English, you'll master pronunciation fast!
Get up and running with the basics of French in this all-video learning path!
